title: torch.load() requires model module in the same folder
body_html: I define a function using torch.load() in folder A and call that function in folder B, and get an error indicating No module named 'model'. BTW, I put the model.py in folder A. It seems like Pytorch requires "model.py" in the folder you use that function related to torch.load(). I check the map_location, which only allows you to change the device for loading. Could you please how to specify the loading path?
